dirt_scattered.description: Scattered brown dirt and rock fragments for exterior ground texture.

dirt_rocky.description: A patch of dirt with scattered rocks and debris for exterior ground texture.

dirt_dense.description: A compact patch of dark brown dirt and stone fragments clustered together for exterior ground texture.

dirt_stony.description: A heavily fragmented dirt surface with numerous dark stone chunks and rocky protrusions for exterior ground texture.

grass_scattered.description: Sparse green grass and vegetation strands scattered thinly across bare ground for exterior terrain.

grass_dense.description: Dense clusters of small green vegetation patches scattered across bare ground for exterior terrain.

grass_sparse.description: Scattered small green grass fragments and vegetation tufts sparsely distributed across bare ground for exterior terrain.

railroad_tracks.description: Vertical railroad tracks with white wooden ties laid across a maroon ground surface for outdoor pathways.

railroad_corner.description: An outer L-shaped corner of railroad tracks with white ties and maroon ground for pathway intersections.

railroad_tjunction.description: A T-shaped railroad track intersection with white ties and maroon ground for three-way pathway junctions.

railroad_crossing.description: A four-way railroad track intersection with white ties and maroon ground for crossing pathways.

railroad_end.description: A U-shaped railroad track terminus with white ties and maroon ground for dead-end pathways.

wall_border_vertical_edge.description: A thin vertical maroon line forming a wall edge or boundary on a light background.

wall_border_inner_corner.description: An inner right-angle corner of a maroon wall forming a recessed junction on a light background.

wall_border_outer_corner.description: An outer corner of a maroon wall forming a protruding junction on a light background.

floor_border_pattern.description: A decorative maroon floor tile with rectangular blocks arranged in an ornamental grid pattern on a light background.

floor_checkerboard_pattern.description: A maroon checkerboard-patterned floor tile with alternating blocks on a light background.

stone_wall_corner_top_right.description: A light stone wall tile with rectangular block patterns forming the top-right corner piece of a stone wall structure.

wood_ladder_top.description: Top of a wooden ladder with two vertical rails and horizontal rungs for vertical climbing.

spike_trap_spikes.description: Jagged tan spikes protruding upward from a spike trap hazard tile.

exclamation_mark_icon.description: A decorative UI icon featuring a centered cross with small square ornaments at each corner, resembling a stylized exclamation mark symbol.

robed_human.description: A standing human figure wearing a long robe or cloak, depicted in pixel art form.

human_standing_simple.description: A minimalist beige human figure with a small square head, white pixel eyes, and a large rectangular body in a neutral standing pose.

human_warrior_spear.description: A standing human warrior wielding a spear or polearm weapon in a ready stance.

helmet_2.description: A flat-topped helmet with a wide rectangular eye opening and protective side plates, designed as headgear for warrior equipment.

helmet_4.description: A wide-brimmed helmet with a distinctive T-shaped eye opening and protective design.

space_helmet.description: A rounded futuristic space helmet with a distinctive dome design and large visor opening.

helmet_6.description: A flat-crowned army-style helmet with a wide brim and protective side plates, featuring a utilitarian military design.

wings_1.description: A pair of feathered angel wings spread outward as equipment or decorative armor piece.

wings_2.description: A pair of angular, pointed wings spread outward as equipment or decorative armor piece.

grass_weathered.description: A verdant grass ground surface with scattered white patches of wear and weathering.

grass_patch.description: A verdant grass ground surface with scattered white patches of wear and weathering.

torii_gate.description: A red wooden torii gate, the traditional entrance portal to a Shinto shrine with two vertical pillars and horizontal crossbeams.

shrine_main.description: A red wooden shrine structure with an open central area and decorative roof eaves, typical of the main prayer hall of a Shinto shrine.

gong.description: A golden gong with an ornamental frame structure, a percussion instrument used in Asian temples and shrines.

space_rip.description: A diagonal tear or rupture effect in beige tones, suggesting a rip in space or a damaged surface.

curved_rip_space.description: A curved diagonal tear or rupture effect in beige tones suggesting a curved rip in space.

claw_rips.description: Multiple parallel diagonal claw scratches or rips in beige tones suggesting a tearing or slashing effect.

planet_with_asteroids.description: A large tan planet sphere surrounded by smaller asteroid or space debris particles.

fire.description: A beige-toned flame or fire effect sprite with a wide base tapering to a pointed tip.

comet.description: A tan celestial object with a bright head and trailing particles forming a comet in flight.

crossed_rip.description: An X-shaped rupture or crossing tear effect in beige tones suggesting crossed rips or damage.

encircled_fire.description: A circular-framed flame or fire effect sprite with concentric rings suggesting an enclosed or contained fire.

golden_key.description: A golden key with a rounded head and rectangular shaft.

cobalt_key.description: A cobalt blue key with a rounded head and rectangular shaft.

red_key.description: A red key with a rounded head and rectangular shaft, matching the style of nearby gold and cobalt keys.

abstract_gears.description: Three interconnected gears of decreasing sizes forming a mechanical gear system in tan tones.

sparkle_particles.description: Scattered beige star or sparkle particles suggesting a magical or ambient effect.

concentric_squares.description: A geometric pattern of nested square rings creating a centered frame effect.

skull.description: A pixelated skull with hollow eye sockets and visible teeth.

blue_potion_full.description: A blue potion bottle with a rounded body and narrow neck, depicting a full potion container.

blue_potion_empty.description: A blue potion bottle with an outlined hollow interior, depicting an empty container ready to be filled.

blue_potion_half.description: A blue potion bottle depicting a half-filled container between empty and full states.

blue_potion_outlined.description: A blue potion bottle with prominent white outline depicting an outlined or empty container.

red_cross.description: A red plus sign icon with white fill, commonly used to indicate health, healing, or medical items in games.

red_cross_button_pressed_up.description: A red cross-shaped button in a pressed state with a white center, depicting an interactive UI element in its active or clicked position.

red_cross_button_pressed_right.description: A red cross-shaped button in a pressed state with white center and directional indicator pointing right.

red_cross_button_pressed_down.description: A red cross-shaped button in a pressed state with white center and directional indicator pointing down.

red_cross_button_pressed_left.description: A red cross-shaped button in a pressed state with white center and directional indicator pointing left.

box_icon.description: A simple outlined square box in beige, commonly used as a generic container or inventory item icon in UI.

monitor_desk.description: A beige desktop monitor or computer screen with a stand base, depicting a piece of office or gaming equipment.

clay_oven.description: A dome-shaped clay oven with a white interior opening and tan brick exterior, depicting a traditional cooking structure.

health_icon.description: A beige cross-shaped health or medical icon commonly used for healing items or interface elements in games.

checkerboard_path.description: A beige and white alternating checkerboard pattern depicting a tiled pathway or flooring surface.

table_cross.description: A tan table with a white cross-shaped top and supportive base.

red_diagonal_roof.description: A red diagonal stepped roof with a jagged edge, depicting a sloped exterior structure element.

red_roof_middle.description: A horizontal red roof section with white chimney or vent openings, representing the middle flat portion of a roofline.

red_roof_diagonal_right.description: The right edge corner of a red stepped roof with white rectangular openings and a jagged diagonal border.

red_pipe_from_ground.description: A red vertical pipe structure with white rectangular openings and supporting side connectors, resembling a plumbing fixture or industrial pipe segment.

red_pipe_horizontal.description: A horizontal red pipe section with white square openings for connections or ventilation.

red_pipe_with_valve.description: A red vertical pipe with concentric square valve openings and white connector segments.

red_lamp.description: A red standing lamp with a wide flat lampshade featuring white square accents and a curved base.

chain_with_hook.description: A vertical chain link segment suspended above a square hook, resembling a grappling or hanging hook mechanism.

fire_hydrant.description: A bright red fire hydrant with stacked cylindrical bands and white connector ports on the sides.

rope_ceiling.description: A rope suspended from above with a loop attachment point and hanging end, suitable for climbing or grappling mechanics.

manhole.description: A round manhole cover with concentric rings and four square access openings for underground infrastructure access.

house_ruins.description: Fragmented beige stone walls and rubble depicting the deteriorated remains of a ruined building structure.

stone_rubble.description: Scattered fragments of broken stone blocks and debris pieces from a destroyed structure.

bar_counter.description: A brown wooden counter or bar surface with a front panel and sturdy base structure suitable for taverns or shops.

portcullis_door.description: A wooden door with a latticed portcullis-style gate mechanism at the top and decorative checkered band at the base.

wooden_door_white_trim.description: A simple wooden door with white trim frame and a small handle on the right panel, designed for interior or residential spaces.

window_maze_pattern.description: A decorative window with an intricate white geometric maze pattern framed in brown, suitable for building exteriors or interior dÃ©cor.

barred_wall.description: A brown wooden wall structure with vertical bars and horizontal cross-beams forming a barred or latticed frame.

wooden_planks.description: A stacked wooden plank floor or wall construction with horizontal layers in light tan and brown tones.

arrow_up.description: A simple upward-pointing arrow in tan color used as a directional indicator icon.

cross_icon.description: A simple tan-colored plus or cross shape used as a directional indicator or selection marker.

directional_pad_icon.description: A tan-colored four-directional pad icon for game controls, featuring arrow indicators pointing up, down, left, and right.

flower_icon.description: A simple tan-colored flower with petals radiating around a central square, used as a decorative icon in the tileset.

snowflake_icon.description: A tan-colored snowflake crystal with six symmetrical points arranged in a radial pattern, used as a decorative winter or weather icon.

sparkle_icon.description: A tan-colored starburst or sparkle effect with radiating pixels creating a magical shiny appearance.

particle_burst_icon.description: A scattered tan-colored particle burst or magical dispersion effect with pixels radiating outward in a random pattern.

star_diamond_icon.description: A geometric star or diamond pattern with tan-colored pixels arranged in four-fold symmetry around a central hollow square.

bone.description: A tan-colored bone with rounded ends connected by a narrow shaft, suitable as a prop item in gameplay.

skull_dinosaur.description: A tan-colored dinosaur skull with visible teeth and jaw structure, suitable as a prop item.

skull_2.description: A tan-colored human skull with hollow eye sockets and visible teeth, suitable as a prop item or decoration.

crosshair_icon.description: A tan-colored targeting reticle composed of four corner brackets arranged symmetrically to form a crosshair pattern.

select_icon.description: A tan-colored selection frame composed of four corner brackets arranged to form a hollow square outline.

select_icon_ornate.description: A tan-colored ornate selection frame with four corner brackets and a central hollow square detail.

select_icon_rounder.description: A tan-colored selection frame with four rounded corner brackets arranged to form a hollow square outline.

hourglass_filled_icon.description: A tan-colored filled hourglass icon depicting sand in the lower chamber and an empty upper chamber.

hourglass_icon_half_full.description: A tan-colored hourglass icon with sand filling both the upper and lower chambers equally, depicting mid-flow timing.

hourglass_icon_outlined.description: A tan-colored outlined hourglass icon with sand visible in both chambers.

joystick_neutral_icon.description: A yellow circular button icon with a centered square within an octagonal border, representing a game controller neutral or center button state.

joystick_up_icon.description: A yellow circular button with an octagonal border and centered square, representing an upward directional input state on a game controller.

joystick_right_icon.description: A yellow circular button with an octagonal border and centered square, representing a rightward directional input state on a game controller.

joystick_down_icon.description: A yellow circular button with an octagonal border and downward-pointing square, representing a downward directional input state on a game controller.

joystick_left_icon.description: A yellow circular button with an octagonal border and leftward-pointing square, representing a leftward directional input state on a game controller.

square_panel_icon.description: A tan-colored rounded square icon representing a generic panel or container UI element.

brick_wall.description: A tan brick wall pattern with rectangular blocks arranged in a staggered masonry layout.

brick_window.description: A tan brick window frame with two vertical panes and thick outer border.

brick_window_2.description: A tan brick window frame with thick outer border and open pane center.

pillar_base.description: A tan base platform with a checkered pillar pattern, forming the foundation of a decorative architectural column.

brick_archway.description: A tan brick archway with a rounded top and supporting columns framing a passage or doorway.

red_brick_window.description: A red brick window frame with a recessed center opening and thick border.

red_brick_wall.description: A solid red brick wall with a scattered checkerboard pattern texture.

red_brick_window_2.description: A red brick square frame with a horizontal bar divider in the center, forming a decorative architectural window element.

wooden_support_pillar.description: A tan wooden support structure with a wide horizontal beam and two vertical posts forming a gate-like frame.

wood_support_reinforced.description: A wooden support structure with two vertical posts and reinforcing cross-braces forming a sturdy architectural support.

red_box.description: A red wooden crate or storage box with reinforced bands and decorative staircase-pattern details.

wooden_column_reinforced.description: A tall tan wooden support column with vertical posts and a decorative staircase-pattern center reinforcement.

barrel.description: A red wooden barrel with horizontal metal bands around its cylindrical body.

barrel_on_fire.description: A red wooden barrel with flames bursting from the top.
